thread.title: Noble CEO Says CDS Prices Were Manipulated
thread.title_full: Noble CEO Says CDS Prices Were Manipulated - WSJ

author: Jake Maxwell Watts
title: Noble CEO Says CDS Prices Were Manipulated
text:
SINGAPORE—The chief executive of embattled commodities trader Noble Group Ltd. Wednesday claimed unspecified individuals had manipulated the price of insuring its debt in an effort to mislead the market and create a liquidity crisis at the company.
Noble boss Yusuf Alireza said he believed manipulation had taken place in the market for Noble’s credit default swaps, known as CDS, an insurance-style product which pays out to investors... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
